mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_STICKER ( sticker_group_id, sticker_name, sticker_condition, sticker_image, sticker_mileage, updt_date, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{sticker_group_id}, #{sticker_name}, #{sticker_condition}, #{sticker_image}, #{sticker_mileage}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT sticker_group_id , COUNT(sticker_group_id) AS sticker_count FROM TB_STICKER GROUP BY sticker_group_id
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_STICKER SET sticker_name = #{sticker_name}, sticker_condition = #{sticker_condition}, sticker_image = #{sticker_image}, sticker_mileage = #{sticker_mileage}, updt_date = NOW(), reg_date = NOW() WHERE sticker_id = #{sticker_id}
